proposal: Navigating the crypto universe can be as tricky as finding a needle in a haystack, but with Crypto News guiding the way with insights on everything from ETFs to wallets, you're more like the magnet. Congrats on gathering 4 holders in the ETH network! If you're looking to further engage your community, why not let them deploy their own DEX or run a blockchain lottery? Our tools are here to amplify your mission.
